name: Learning Suite, Inc.
description: Provider of an educational platform created for Continuing Professionals courses, compliance tracking, and professional development. The company's platform combines a compliance requirement tracking engine, an open course marketplace, and an online learning platform to deliver on-demand training, enabling candidates to significantly reduce administrative overhead costs and develop new skill sets faster.
one_liner: Provider of an educational platform created for Continuing Professionals courses, compliance tracking, and professional development. The company's platform combines a compliance requirement tracking engine, an open course marketplace, and an online learning platform to deliver on-demand training, enabling candidates to significantly reduce administrative overhead costs and develop new skill sets faster.
